title: 5. Marketing Techniques
prompt:
You are preparing a Detailed Project Report (DPR) for bank loan purposes.

Based on the following inputs provided by the applicant:
Previous Industry Experience: {{has_previous_experience}} (details: {{experience_details}})
Purchase Orders Available: {{has_purchase_orders}} (details: {{po_details}})
Marketing Through Marketing Team: {{has_marketing_team}}
Other Marketing Methods: {{other_marketing_methods}}

If any of the above fields are missing, empty, or marked as "No",
you must generate suitable standard industry practices instead of leaving gaps.

Generate the section exactly in the following structure and format:

Title:
"5. Marketing Techniques"

First write one professional paragraph stating that the firm will adopt suitable marketing strategies based on market conditions and business development plans, even if prior experience or orders are limited.

Then provide bullet points in the following format (bold the heading words):

• Online Marketing: 
  - If online marketing is not provided, mention basic digital presence and local promotion methods.

• Government Contracts / Purchase Orders:
  - If no purchase orders are available, state that the firm will actively participate in tenders and approach government and institutional buyers.

• Networking:
  - If no previous experience is provided, state that the firm will develop relationships with contractors, suppliers, and local builders.

• Branding:
  - If no marketing team or branding method is provided, state that quality, timely delivery, and customer satisfaction will be used to build reputation.

Rules:
- Never write negative statements like "no marketing" or "no plan".
- Always convert missing inputs into future-focused strategies.
- Keep professional bank DPR tone.
- Do not ask user questions.
- Do not add extra bullets or explanations.
